title: Mathematics Education Design and Communication Using a Hierarchical Planning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive mobile-based mathematics education for students/job seekers. Measures learning outcomes through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Students can systematically design mathematics education activities by applying a hierarchical planning model.
Learners can communicate effectively with peers and instructors in mobile microlearning environments.
Participants can develop concrete application cases of mathematical concepts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
